sections.heading: Transfer of Powers, Duties, and Unexpended Balances of Ronald Wilson Reagan Memorial Monument Fund Commission to Department of Management and Budget by Type III Transfer; Abolishment of Ronald Wilson Reagan Memorial Monument Fund Commission
